cause.description:
Many of you might recall a certain someone to which this cause was formed for. well its time i think that we forget about the past and live in the now. W/E he did then is over its a new year. so for now this cause is on lockdown. It is unspoken of. BUt il have you know that if the events of which started this cause go down again this year we will reopen and recuit more. BUT until then its done with
1. change
cause.mission: the past is the future with the lights on
cause.name: FR FOUNDATION
